snippet: The focus next week turns to corporate earnings, and so far the outlook is discouraging.
abstract: Stocks advance, ending second straight weekly gain for the market, in part because of General Electric announcement that it will sell its lending business.
lead_paragraph: The focus next week turns to corporate earnings, and so far the outlook is discouraging.

headline.main: Market Higher for Second Straight Week, With G.E. Leading the Dow
headline.print_headline: Market Closes Higher for Second Consecutive Week
